#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
#include<map>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
using namespace std;
long long a[1000000];
long long b[1000000];
int main()
{
    long long i,t,n,m;
    a[0]=1;
    b[0]=1;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
        for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        a[i]=(a[i-1]+b[i-1])%m;
        b[i]=(a[i]+b[i-1])%m;
    }
    printf("%lld/%lld\n",a[n-1],b[n-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
